citation: Proclamation under the Mental Health Amendment Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Mental Health Amendment Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Mental Health Amendment Act 2016 fix 1 July 2017 as the day on which that Act commences.

12 June 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Health

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 June 2017

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
